comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Most likely Jennie Watkins who made a record as a life insurance agent, see The New York Times, January 14, 1916, "WOMAN IN '$200'000 CLUB' "

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: B-59: It does seem likely that it's the same woman, I agree.  We may add this information, possibly qualifying it with a 'possibly'. Thank you for linking to the article.
